title: If I pause haram video 2 watch Islamic video then go back 2 haram video Is this kufr assim al hakeem
transcript: sh if someone is watching a Haram video and then pauses it and then watches an Islamic video on another Tab while the Haram video is paed after the Islamic video he returns watching to the Haram video is this kufur since this could be mocking Allah his intention is not to mock Allah but he just doesn't want to cut the Haram video it is not kufur it is sinful
